nodes.bodyText:
The OpenTelemetry SDK is in the agent class loader, so won't be accessible directly from auto-instrumentation.
Unless we want to shade and put it in the bootstrap class loader.
I wonder if we will have other use cases like this.
For now(?), maybe add a forceFlush() method in auto-api (soon to be javaagent-instrumentation-api), and register the underlying implementation during agent startup (the implementation needs to live in the agent class loader so it can call the SDK directly).
